name: FEMALE CLOVER - ESPEJO FÉMINA
description:
The Feminine disjoints the reality of those tantalized by our disquieting physical form. 
These lines from the poem, pictured by @D_Mogeon, are meant to remark the old attempt to make us feel embarrased of our bodies.
The clover as a synonym of the vision society has of what they think being a woman means. Certain aspects, the amount of petals and the justification of the pillars of a society are broken when a clover has four or five of them. 
Las mujeres no queremos más ser clasificadas según los valores que sostuvieron y sostienen sociedades inhumanas en las que estamos destinadas a desaparecer.
